net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component.composite.editor

Interface ValueEditor<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - the value type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Component, Editable, Iterable<Component>, net.proteusframework.core.locale.LocaleContextSource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSimpleValueEditor, BooleanValueEditor, ComboBoxValueEditor, LocalizedTextEditor, NumberEditor, ProgrammaticIdentifierEditor, TextEditor

    public interface ValueEditor<V>
extends Component, Editable
    Component used for editing a value.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Detail

      • commitValue

        @Nullable
V commitValue()
              throws MIWTException
        Commit changes from the UI to the internal value and return the internal value. Typically, the caller is responsible for persistence.
        Returns:
        the value or null if no value was captured.
        Throws:
        MIWTException - on error.

      • getModificationState

        ValueEditor.ModificationState getModificationState()
        Check if the UI has state changes pending for the value.
        Returns:
        optional true or false.

      • getUIValue

        @Nullable
V getUIValue(org.apache.log4j.Level logErrorLevel)
        Get the value currently in the UI. This is useful to peek at the value prior to calling commitValue(). If you need to know whether there is a change or if the UI is in a valid state call getModificationState() or validateUIValue(Notifiable).
        Parameters:
        logErrorLevel - if an error occurs, the log level to log it at.
        Returns:
        the value in the UI. Will be null if the UI can represent a null state or the value is invalid.

      • getValue

        @Nullable
V getValue()
        Get the internal value. This doesn't reflect any changes made in the UI. Use validateUIValue(Notifiable) and commitValue() to obtain state changes.
        Returns:
        the value.

      • setValue

        void setValue(@Nullable
            V value)
        Set the value and update the UI.
        Parameters:
        value - the value. May be null to indicate the absence of a value.

      • validateUIValue

        boolean validateUIValue(net.proteusframework.core.notification.Notifiable notifiable)
        Validate the value from the current state of the UI. This should return false for any case that commitValue() would throw an Exception.
        Parameters:
        notifiable - notifiable to send messages.
        Returns:
        true if the value passed validation; otherwise false.
